name: Yakyosho
description:
Yukio, a high school teacher, has fallen asleep at the end of the day, just like any other day really... but this time it's different, the air is cold, the sky has turned red, everything is dark and strange whispers are heard. and steps... many things have changed.
It all seems like a bad dream, until he realizes that he had already woken up, and while he was dreaming he had heard a warning:
"I'm going to devour you human, if you can't escape, light the 12 lamps of the yokai dimension to escape"
And so the young professor understood that he was going to be devoured if he failed to escape.



Puzzles, scares and strange creatures await you at the institute!



Terror in the environment: Yakyosho generates scares and moments of tension with the help of the environment and sounds. In the institute you can expect different mechanics, terrifying creatures and guaranteed scares.

Puzzles: Different mechanics to help you escape and force you to explore the entire environment, light and simple, but recurring, complete them to give you a little help while trying to complete the main mission.



Story: Different chapters, each focused on a teacher's nightmare, one after another.

Early Access:

To offer a better experience, we open early access, to listen to feedback, find bugs and also implement ideas from our players that we validate and believe are original and can go well with the game.
